question: my baby irritates me alot (she is 6 months old, can i take her in my hands along with offering prayer
answer:
QUESTION

i want to ask that if my baby irritates me alot (she is 6 months old) when i am offering my prayer  (bajamat) in makkah can i take her in  my hands along with offering prayer

ANSWER


Share:

It is permissible to hold the child during salaat with one hand. (Fatawa Hindiya vol. 1 pg. 113)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
